resources.string:
Our Location
 RedDot BrewHouse @ Boat Quay
 33/34 Boat Quay Singapore, 049823
 
 Operational Hours

 Monday to Thursday :12pm to 12am
 Lunch: 12pm to 2.30pm
 Dinner: 6.00pm to 10.00pm


Friday, Saturday and
 Eve of Public Holidays :12pm to 1am
 Lunch: 12pm to 2.30pm
 Dinner: 6.00pm to 10.30pm


Sundays : Closed


For reservation, call us at 6535-4500
 We welcome all feedback so do drop us a 
 note at rd@reddotbrewhouse.com.sg

 For event enquiries, call us at 6535 4100 or 
 email to rd@reddotbrewhouse.com.sg
